SEARCH
Package com.platform.auth.api

Class OAuth2Controller

java.lang.Object
com.platform.auth.api.OAuth2Controller
@RestController @Profile("!test") @RequestMapping("/auth/oauth2") @CrossOrigin(origins={"${app.frontend-url}","http://localhost:3000"}, allowCredentials="true") public class OAuth2Controller extends Object
REST controller for OAuth2 authentication endpoints with PKCE support. Handles OAuth2 authorization flows, provider configuration, and session management.
